Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.eventing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonSelectionEvent
    This event is fired by a SWTButton each time the button is pressed.
    ComboboxSelectionEvent
    This event is fired by a SWTComboBox each time its value changes (e.g. by user-selection).
    TableDeselectionEvent
    The event is fired as a WidgetSelectionEvent by SWTTable instances.
    TableSelectionEvent
    The event is fired as a WidgetSelectionEvent by SWTTable instances.
    TreeTableSelectionEvent
    The event is fired as a WidgetSelectionEvent by SWTTreeTable instances.
    WidgetSelectionEvent
    This event is fired by widget of the guided configuration when a selection is done (e.g. cells are selected in a table, a button is pressed).
